cz.ive.simulation
Interface CalendarPlanning

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalendarPlanner
public interface CalendarPlanning

Simulation calendar access point. There should be a singleton implementation of this interface allowing everybody to plan its actions to the future. The singleton should be public (unlike Calendar itself).

Author:
Ondra

Method Detail

plan

Hook plan(long time)
Plans Hook signaling after specified period of time.

Parameters:
time - period of time in milliseconds
Returns:
Hook to be signaled

replan

void replan(Hook hook,
            long time,
            boolean clear)
Replans Hook to signal after specified period of time.

Parameters:
hook - Hook to be replanned, it must be a hook created by plan() method of CalendarPlanner, or the ClassCast exception will be thrown.
time - period of time in milliseconds
clear - Determines whether the hook should be cleared before it's usage. If set to false, the hook will be only replanned, all listeners remaining. If set to true, the hook will be cleared to reuse the structure as a new hook.

cancelHook

void cancelHook(Hook hook)
                throws HookNotPlannedException
Cancels the hook planned by plan() method. Notifies all listeners about the hook cancel and deletes the hook. If the canceled hook was not planned by plan() method, the HookNotPlannedException will be thrown.

Parameters:
hook - Hook to cancel
Throws:
HookNotPlannedException

getSimulationTime

long getSimulationTime()
Gets the current simulation time

Returns:
The simulation time

getSimulationDate

java.util.Date getSimulationDate()
Gets the current simulation time in the java Date representation.

Returns:
The simulation date and time

getSimulationTimeString

java.lang.String getSimulationTimeString()
Gets the current simulation time as a String.

Returns:
String representing a current simulation time

getRoundHook

Hook getRoundHook(CalendarPlanner.RoundHookPosition pos)
Gets the hook, which is pulled after each simlation step, in which at least one event has occured.

Parameters:
pos - Position of the roundHook
Returns:
The round hook
